DOC.brief_summary: To determine the response rate of pazopanib when administered as monotherapy in patients with unresectable neuroendocrine tumor.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Pazopanib Monotherapy in Patients With Unresectable, Metastatic Neuroendocrine Tumor
DOC.criteria: low to intermediate grade neuroendocrine tumor not amenable to surgery or local therapy poorly differentiated (high grade or anaplastic)/small cell, pheochromocytoma
